entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView.Footer content is flipped when CollectionView FlowDirection="RightToLeft" #16152
  • Expandable items in a StackLayout don't work properly in iOS #16150
  • NavigationPage.TitleView displays incorrectly on Windows #16149
  • [iOS] Grid layout not working good on iPhone SE #16148
  • Building for Android fails because iOS SDK is missing #16146
  • Baidu Push SDK: No implementation found for void crc6488302ad6e9e4df1a.MauiApplication.n_onCreate() #16142
    Backlog
  • EFCore Migrations Not Supported By Maui Class Libraries #16140
  • Maui Blazor example project doesnt load sidebar if the projectname contains a space #16139
  • .NET MAUI Android ListView issues #16137
  • CollectionView crashes when ItemsLayout is set to HorizontalGrid #16135

Closed

  • XamlC error XFC0000 prevents launch #15999
  • AppThemeBindingExtension not working in code #16126
  • Blank .NET MAUI App crashes on iOS 12 device with .NET 8 preview 6 #16097
    Backlog
  • SVG Images from my nuget package gets added to the home folder when the nuget is added #16123
  • Label content within VerticalStackLayout with WidthRequest Set overflows container on iOS #9639
    Backlog
  • Crashes in apps built with visual studio 17.6.* #16001
    .NET 8
  • ScrollView Cuts Off Content Underneath it Depending on Simulator #15514
    .NET 8 GA
  • Android: text color in buttons in alert dialog and picker dialog for default theme has very low contrast in dark mode #15088
    Backlog
  • WSA or Android Emulator fails to render BindableLayouts content, although in Windows everything is fine #12459
    Backlog
  • Switching Tabs after resuming from background throws System.NullReferenceException on Android #12498
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout text missing in Release mode, when using DataTemplate without x:DataType #14865
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui DisplayAlert action button colours do not work properly for multiple themes #16112
  • [Regression] [Android] ImageButton with Clip and bound IsVisible property does not display #12972
    Backlog
  • "Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Page' to type 'Microsoft.Maui.IContentView'." #16000
  • In maui, when using stepper to combine Entry and Editor, clicking the + sign does not respond and the value does not change #16002
  • Android Overview Page and the iOS App Switcher page icon problem maui #16005
  • [WinUI] Add logic to set `DefaultLabelPosition` on the WinUI CommandBar #12063
    .NET 8 GA
  • Navigation data is retained and also presented to IQueryAttributable on Back navigation. #10294
    .NET 8 GA
  • How to access the font file that location in the Resources folder in the .NET MAUI app. #16129

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨
  • [WIN] Add Switch.ShowStatusLabel Platform-Specific #16147
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [controls] fix memory leak with Grid Row/ColumnDefinitions #16145
    layout-grid, memory-leak 💦
  • Merge main into net8.0 #16144
  • OOTB Templates Building for Linux #16143
    area/templates 📄
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.2.0 #16141
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix support for VisualDiagnosticsOverlay/IWindowOverlay on Android Shell Apps #16138
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label

Merged

  • [tests] fix DeviceTests on Windows, maybe other platforms? #16151
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Avoid to use CornerCurve in iOS < 13 #16101
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, high
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Update sourcelink, set deterministic builds in CI #16127
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge
  • Add logic to set DefaultLabelPosition on the WinUI CommandBar #15835
    platform/windows 🪟, area/toolbar
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks; #16078
  • [Windows] Fix Slider MinimumTrackColor (#16056) #16057
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-slider
  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested
  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • Add VS Feedback and VS Code links to bug report template list #16121
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
    area/layout 🔲, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮, area/FlyoutPage, area/modal, control-swipeview, area/ListView, control-border
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
